summary: A father moves with his three sons and their beautiful, hard working servant in a big, old house in the countryside, where a weird drowsiness seems to occupy the four men. Will it be possible for one of them to break free?
cast: Olga Karlatos|George Dialegmenos|Dimitris Poulikakos|Nikitas Tsakiroglou|Vasilis Diamantopoulos|Kostas Sfikas|Ivi Mavridi|Thanassis Koniaris
title: The Idlers of the Fertile Valley
